bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum w/ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, AngleSet compatible, internal control routing, stealth seatpost routing, alloy EVO Link, Mino Link, replaceable derailleur hanger, 160mm travel
